about_the_game:
Food Magician is an fantasy action-adventure game that filled with hidden treasures, dangerous creatures, and ancient ruins.

A New Adventure Is Waiting For You

Get ready for an epic journey through a realm filled with danger, mystery, and adventure. In Food Magician, you'll be a brave magician on a quest to save the world from evil power. Explore a beautiful fantasy world filled with hidden treasures, dangerous creatures, and ancient ruins waiting to be discovered. With a mix of thrilling combat and challenging puzzles, your story will be told.


As you progress through the game, you'll encounter a different characters, each with their own unique stories and motivations. The game features various gameplay mechanics, including real-time combat, traps, and puzzle-solving. You'll need make quick decisions, to use all of your skills and wits to overcome the challenges that lie ahead.

With stunning graphics, beautiful music, and a rich and detailed world to explore, Food Magician is sure to provide hours of entertainment and excitement. Are you ready to embark on the adventure of a lifetime?



* 2 modes of difficulties: Normal and Hell
* 4 major regions of game world
* More than 20+ types of monsters
* Lots of traps and puzzles
* Hours of adventures
